index_terms: DEPARTMENT OF HOUSING AND URBAN DEVELOPMENT
summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the HOME program; accepting a $3,928,000 grant from the United States Department of Housing and Urban Development; authorizing execution of a HOME Investment Partnership Agreement and related documents; establishing a new account of the Low-Income Housing Fund for the deposit of the HOME grant and program income received; appropriating HOME funds for housing programs; authorizing the Mayor and Director of the Department of Housing and Human Services to implement HOME programs; and ratifying and confirming prior acts.
committee: Housing, Health, Human Services and Education
